translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

I hand over to Your Excellency today, under no. 83, which Your Excellency Sir Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency General Headquarters in Bagé, January 1, 1842. To citizen General João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the 1st Army Corps. Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre 1st Deputy of the Chief General of the Army General Staff
